item.Name: Old Food
item.Description: Not the freshest but it will do for now.

item.Name: New Food
item.Description: The only source of nurishment nowadays.

item.Name: Old Water
item.Description: It has an undefineable taste.

item.Name: Fresh Water
item.Description: My favorite drink.

item.Name: Used Medpack
item.Description: Looks like someone already used it.

item.Name: Medpack
item.Description: This will come in handy to patch me up.

item.Name: Old Antibiotics
item.Description: I think they are passed date.

item.Name: Antibiotics
item.Description: This will slow donw my sickness for some time.

item.Name: Gas Can
item.Description: Essential to travel for more resources.

item.Name: Ammunition
item.Description: A gun without bullets is pretty useless.

item.Name: Baseball Bat
item.Description: Better than my fists.

item.Name: Rusty Knife
item.Description: In case I have to defend myself.

item.Name: Knife
item.Description: Efficiant for close combat.

item.Name: Blade
item.Description: People won't mess with me if I walk with this in a room.

item.Name: Pistol
item.Description: I hope I won't need to use it.

item.Name: Shotgun
item.Description: Praise the USA!

item.Name: Jacket
item.Description: A random jacket, quite useless.

item.Name: Thick Coat
item.Description: The padding is designed to protect from the cold, but it'll do for now.

item.Name: Homemade armor
item.Description: This could help stop a blade.

item.Name: Bulletproof vest
item.Description: Police used to protect us.

item.Name: Swat gear
item.Description: The best protection I can find. It's heavy though.

road.Name: Gas station
road.Description: Good place to find some fuel.

road.Name: Abandonned House
road.Description: I may be able to find some gear and food there.

road.Name: Old Durg Store
road.Description: I hope there's some medical supplies left.

road.Name: Supermarket
road.Description: I'll at least find some food...

road.Name: Motel
road.Description: Best chance to find a bit of everything.

road.Name: Beet Farm
road.Description: I've heard crazy farmers had a lot of weapons.

Dialogue: Morning Stranger, care to trade some items?
Hoddy! If you want we can exchange some items
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
You are certain they are not lying.

Dialogue: Morning Stranger, care to trade some items?
Hoddy! If you want we can exchange some items
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
They are bluffing and it's now really obvious.

Dialogue: Can you spare some items? I need to help my family.
I Beg you to help me, I'll die if you don't
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
You are certain they are not lying.

Dialogue: Can you spare some items? I need to help my family.
I Beg you to help me, I'll die if you don't
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
They are bluffing and it's now really obvious.

Dialogue: There's a fee for snooping around here. Pay up or leave.
If you wish to search this place, you'll need to give us something
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
You are certain they are not lying.

Dialogue: There's a fee for snooping around here. Pay up or leave.
If you wish to search this place, you'll need to give us something
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
They are bluffing and it's now really obvious.

Dialogue: HEY! Who are you? You better back off or else...
Go away it's MY place! Go away I said!
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
You are certain they are not lying.

Dialogue: HEY! Who are you? You better back off or else...
Go away it's MY place! Go away I said!
InvestigationDialogue: You cannot tell if they are saying the truth.
They are bluffing and it's now really obvious.

Dialogue: You shouldn't have come here...
I'LL KILL YOU!!
I don't see anyone here. Thank God.
It's quiet, too quit. Let's hurry up.

results.Name: Gain Energy
Text: During this expedition you gained:
You fill happy that luck may be on your side. You feel a boost in energy.
You are glad not everyone has turned to crime.
They look at you with a big smile as you leave. You smile back.

results.Name: Gain Items
Text: During this expedition you gained:
They are so grateful they give you some of their surplus.
They are happy you are not there to attack them; they give you some items for your travels.
They think you look like a nice person. They hid a gift in your caravan.

results.Name: Find Bluff
Text: During this expedition you gained:
You call their bluff and they step back, ashamed. They give you some items to apologize.
They freeze, obviously confused. You take some of their items and they stand there, paralyzed.
They try to double down on their bluff, but it fails. You leave with some extra items.

results.Name: Fight Lost
Text: They attacked you and were better equipped. You managed to go back to the caravan but are hurt.
They started a fight and you could not beat them. You barely escaped.
How could you lose? You think you should maybe just stop tryingâ€¦

results.Name: Fight Won
Text: You managed to fight back without a scratch. You better get back on the road.
They attacked you but could match your equipment. They are dead now.
You barely made it out alive. You are quite in shock.

results.Name: Lost Items
Text: You came back having lost:
They stole from you while you were not looking. You are lucky they are not violent.
The are missing some items. Looks like you have been burgled.

results.Name: Bluff Fight
Text: You called their bluff and were wrong. You took them out as they were attacking you.
They were serious but you managed to overpower them.

results.Name: Bluff Fight Lost
Text: You came back having lost:
You guessed wrong! They overpowered you and stole some items.
They were not kidding. They attacked you and took some items while laughing.

results.Name: Walk away
Text: They stare at you without saying a word.
They turn back minding their business without paying more attention to you.
You could swear they want to attack you, but they do not move as you leave.
They look on edge and ready to flee. You leave without an incident.
